alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Coconino Plateau; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Marble and Glen Canyons; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264; Western Mogollon Rim; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued September 28 at 12:48PM MST until September 30 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM MST /11 AM MDT/ TO 8 PM MST /9 PM MDT/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts of 40 to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...The Mogollon Rim, White Mountains, Little Colorado River Valley, Grand Canyon, Kaibab Plateau, and Black Mesa. * WHEN...From 10 AM MST /11 AM MDT/ to 8 PM MST /9 PM MDT/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could snap resulting in a few power outages. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Patchy blowing dust will lead to reduced visibilities, resulting in hazardous driving conditions at times.
info.instruction: Secure loose outdoor objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles, such as RVs, campers, and tractor trailers. Use extra caution.
